name: part_005
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】1 day 4 colors【#ホロ4期生ライブ2025】 [H8A2CZiyc_E]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Himemori Luna performs 'Kimi wo Nosete' (Carrying You) on a clock-themed stage.
MC segment where Luna and Kanata talk about their performances and the changing stage.
Amane Kanata and Himemori Luna perform 'Get Wild' wearing swimsuits and sunglasses.

subtitles.original: 父さんが残した 熱い想い
subtitles.english: Father's burning desire he left behind

subtitles.original: 母さんがくれた あのまなざし
subtitles.english: Mother's look she gave me

subtitles.original: 地球はまわる 君をかくして
subtitles.english: The Earth rotates, hiding you

subtitles.original: 輝く瞳 きらめく灯火
subtitles.english: Shining eyes, sparkling lights

subtitles.original: 地球はまわる 君をのせて
subtitles.english: The Earth rotates, carrying you

subtitles.original: いつかきっと出会う ぼくらをのせて
subtitles.english: Someday we will surely meet, carrying us

subtitles.original: どうざんなのあ〜！
subtitles.english: How was that, nanora!

subtitles.original: ルーナの歌、めちゃめちゃ聞き入っちゃったよ！
subtitles.english: Luna, I was totally captivated by your singing!

subtitles.original: いや、かなたんの歌もかっこよかったのらよ。
subtitles.english: No, Kanatan's singing was cool too, nanora.

subtitles.original: 本当？ あ、じゃあそんな社交辞令も終わったところで。
subtitles.english: Really? Well, now that the social niceties are over...
Oh?

subtitles.original: というわけで、4期生ライブ皆さん楽しんでますかー？
subtitles.english: So, is everyone enjoying the 4th generation live?

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: ハッシュタグはこちら。
subtitles.english: The hashtag is right here.

subtitles.original: ハッシュタグ、これで！
subtitles.english: This is the hashtag!

subtitles.original: ガンガン呟いてな〜！
subtitles.english: Keep those tweets coming!

subtitles.original: つぶやいてのら！
subtitles.english: Please tweet about it!

subtitles.original: はい、そしてこのステージ見てください。めちゃめちゃ綺麗だよね。
subtitles.english: Yes, and look at this stage. It's so beautiful, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 綺麗！
subtitles.english: Beautiful!

subtitles.original: これね、時間が進むと景色も変わっていくステージでございます。
subtitles.english: This is a stage where the scenery changes as time passes.

subtitles.original: しゅごいのら〜。
subtitles.english: That's amazing, nanora~.

subtitles.original: ぜひチェックしてください。
subtitles.english: Please check it out.

subtitles.original: さてさて、お次の曲なんですが、ルーナさん。
subtitles.english: Now then, for the next song... Luna-san.

subtitles.original: ご準備の方はいかがでしょうか？
subtitles.english: How are your preparations coming along?

subtitles.original: まあ、任せのら。
subtitles.english: Well, leave it to me, nanora.

subtitles.original: おお。
subtitles.english: Oh.

subtitles.original: では、次の曲は擦り散らかした「Get Wild」。
subtitles.english: Well then, the next song is the well-worn "Get Wild".

subtitles.original: Get Wild.
subtitles.english: Get Wild.

subtitles.original: アスファルトタイヤを切りつけながら
subtitles.english: Tearing up the asphalt tires

subtitles.original: 暗闇走り抜ける
subtitles.english: Running through the darkness

subtitles.original: チープなスリルに身をまかせても
subtitles.english: Even if I give myself up to cheap thrills

subtitles.original: 明日に怯えていたよ
subtitles.english: I was afraid of tomorrow

subtitles.original: It's your pain or my pain or somebody's pain
subtitles.english: It's your pain or my pain or somebody's pain

subtitles.original: 誰かのために生きられるなら
subtitles.english: If I can live for someone else

subtitles.original: It's your dream or my dream or somebody's dream
subtitles.english: It's your dream or my dream or somebody's dream

subtitles.original: 何も怖くはない
subtitles.english: I'm not afraid of anything

subtitles.original: Get wild and tough
subtitles.english: Get wild and tough

subtitles.original: ひとりでは解けない愛のパズルを抱いて
subtitles.english: Holding the puzzle of love that cannot be solved alone

subtitles.original: Get wild and tough
subtitles.english: Get wild and tough

subtitles.original: この街でやさしさに甘えていたくはない
subtitles.english: I don't want to rely on the kindness in this city

subtitles.original: Get chance and luck
subtitles.english: Get chance and luck

subtitles.original: 君だけが守れるものがどこかにあるさ
subtitles.english: There is something that only you can protect somewhere

subtitles.original: Get chance and luck
subtitles.english: Get chance and luck

subtitles.original: ひとりでも傷ついた夢をとりもどすよ
subtitles.english: Even alone, I'll take back my wounded dream

subtitles.original: クルマのライトにキスを投げては
subtitles.english: Throwing a kiss at the car's headlights

subtitles.original: シャドウで踊るあの娘
subtitles.english: That girl dancing in the shadow

subtitles.original: 冷たい夜空をステージにして
subtitles.english: Making the cold night sky the stage

subtitles.original: 哀しくおどけていたね
subtitles.english: You were joking around sadly

subtitles.original: It's your pain or my pain or somebody's pain
subtitles.english: It's your pain or my pain or somebody's pain

subtitles.original: 誰かのために愛せるのなら
subtitles.english: If I can love for someone else

subtitles.original: It's your dream or my dream or somebody's dream
subtitles.english: It's your dream or my dream or somebody's dream

subtitles.original: きっと強くなれる
subtitles.english: I can surely become stronger

subtitles.original: Get wild and tough
subtitles.english: Get wild and tough

subtitles.original: ひとりでは消せない痛み心に抱いて
subtitles.english: Holding the pain in my heart that cannot be erased alone

subtitles.original: Get wild and tough
subtitles.english: Get wild and tough

subtitles.original: この街で自由をもてあましだくはない
subtitles.english: I don't want to have more freedom than I can handle in this city

subtitles.original: Get chance and luck
subtitles.english: Get chance and luck

subtitles.original: 君だけが守れるものがどこかにあるさ
subtitles.english: There is something that only you can protect somewhere
